articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits June 8 Farm of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits June 8 Farm of KPA
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), gave field guidance to the newly-built vegetable greenhouses at the June 8 Farm of the KPA.
					 He was very pleased to see the greenhouses in rows, saying that they were built neatly and they look like a picture. 
					
					 Going round different parts of the greenhouses, he acquainted himself in detail with their construction and vegetable growing. 
					
					 The greenhouses, built in a hill-area to make better use of land, are spectacular when they are looked up or down, he said.
					
					 They are flawless in every aspect, he said, adding: It is important to build a greenhouse well but more important is to do farming well there so that the servicepersons can get a great benefit from it. 
					
					 In order to ensure the effective greenhouse farming, it is necessary to pay attention to the work for raising the responsibility and technical knowledge of farmers, he said, stressing the need to actively introduce advanced farming methods in cooperation with vegetable science institutes so as to put the scientification and intensification of greenhouse farming on a higher level.
					
					 Efforts should be directed to the scientific and technological distribution to fan up the flame of collective innovation in the supply service of the people's army, he said, giving an instruction to found a monthly magazine that explains about the Party's policy related to the supply service and indicates tasks and ways for its implementation and introduces advanced science and technology and good experiences.
					
					 He gave thanks of the supreme commander to the units involved in the construction of vegetable greenhouses.
					
					 He said: The vegetable greenhouses newly built at the June 8 Farm well show how the People's Army approaches and implements the Party's policy. The army makes it an inveterate habit to carry out any order, policy and instruction of the Party at once and perfectly and report about the results. This is just the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					 Terming the vegetable greenhouses of the June 8 Farm a standard and model one, he called for conducting a vigorous drive to supply fresh vegetable to the people in all seasons by making the example of the KPA spread across the country like wildfire.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Pak Yong Sik, Han Kwang Sang and Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex.
					 He went round galvanizing shop, cold-rolling shop and other places of the complex to acquaint himself in detail with the production of iron and steel.
					
					 A consultative meeting of officials concerned took place on the spot.
					
					 The meeting stressed such matters as increasing the production to the maximum on the basis of the existing production foundation and enhancing the role of technicians and skilled workers.
					
					 It took measures to decisively increase the proportion of locally available raw materials and fuel in the production of iron and steel.
					
					 Earlier, the premier went round the Pyongyang Catfish Farm and discussed issues of putting fish farming on a scientific and intensive basis and boosting the production by raising the food processing capacity and took measures to settle them.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President 
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria, on the occasion of the New Year Juche 104 (2015).
					 The gift was handed over to the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Dec. 23.

articles.title: S. Korean Resident Handed over to S. Korean Red Crossã€€
articles.content:
S. Korean Resident Handed over to S. Korean Red Cross
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Red Cross Society handed over a south Korean resident, who illegally entered into the territory of the north side, to the south Korean Red Cross via Panmunjom Friday.

articles.title: Youth and Students Meet
articles.content:
Youth and Students Meet
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting of youth and students took place at the Hall of the Youth League on Friday to celebrate the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA was a historic event of great significance in developing the Korean revolutionary armed forces and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The history of his Songun revolution records deep loving care and trust he has shown by projecting the youth league as vanguard ranks intensely loyal to the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) by successfully carrying forward the politics of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on attaching importance to the youth and their love for the youth, they noted.
					
					 Under the warm care of Kim Jong Un the members of the young vanguard across the country are fully displaying their resourcefulness and courage on all fronts for the building of a thriving nation, they pointed out.
					
					 They called upon all officials of the youth league and its members to discharge their mission and duty as the reliable scout party and flank unit of the WPK in the on-going grandiose drive for winning the final victory under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, officials concerned, those of the youth league and youth and students.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of Youth League
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of Youth League
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A performance "Forward, Youth, Flying Flag of Supreme Commander!" was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Hall of the Youth League on Friday to celebrate the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as narration and serial songs "We Will Win Victory, Flying the Colours of the Supreme Commander", female duet "Our Destiny and Future Entrusted to You" and dialogic poem "The Day Is in Sight".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the boundless reverence of the five million young people for Kim Jong Un who is glorifying forever the Songun revolutionary idea and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and leading the Korean revolution to victory and glory.
					
					 Also staged were numbers reflecting the strong determination of the young vanguard to demonstrate the honor of the shock brigade in the drive to win the final victory of the great Paektusan nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Folk Music Contest Held
articles.content:
National Folk Music Contest Held
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A national folk music contest was closed in the DPRK some days ago.
					 In this regard, an official of the Ministry of Culture told KCNA that the contest was aimed at encouraging the singing of folk songs and playing of national instruments among people so as to make the national feelings and flavor prevail in the country.
					
					 The contest was held divided into three fields with the attendance of over 40 art squads and groups selected from commissions, ministries, national institutions and provinces.
					
					 They put on stage colorful numbers in diverse forms like vocal solo and chorus and instrumental solo and ensemble.
					
					 The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the art groups of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and Pyongyang Department Store No. 1 took the first place in the contest.

articles.title: New Power Station Goes Operational
articles.content:
New Power Station Goes Operational
						
 Hamju, December 26 (KCNA) -- Hamju Chusang Power Station No. 1 has been built in the DPRK.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il advanced the task to wind up the construction of Chusang Power Station No. 1 earlier than scheduled when he was providing field guidance to the completed Kumjingang Hungbong Youth Power Station on November 14, Juche 95 (2006). He clearly indicated the ways to do so.
					
					 He praised the builders of the power station, saying they were as worthy as pearl, and led them with loving care to perform miracles and innovations in the construction.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) learned about the achievements made by members of the young shock brigade, working people and officials in Hamju County in the construction of Hamju Chusang Power Station No. 1, showed deep loving care for them and encouraged them.
					
					 They built the power station through the drive for carrying out the party's idea and defending the party's policy by overcoming all difficulties and ordeals.
					
					 A ceremony of completing the construction of the power station took place on the spot on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials of the county, members of the young shock brigade and other working people.
					
					 A message of thanks of the WPK Central Committee to the members of the young shock brigade, working people and officials who performed labor feats in the construction of the power station was conveyed at the ceremony.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony its participants went round the power station.

articles.title: Osandok Prize Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Osandok Prize Sports Contest Closes
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Osandok Prize Sports Contest closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink on Friday.
					 It opened on Dec. 3 to mark the birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The Taesongsan Sports Team came first in the team standings, the Jangjasan Sports Team second and the Sobaeksu Sports Team third.

articles.title: Glucose Test Paper under Production
articles.content:
Glucose Test Paper under Production
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Chemical and Biological Institute under University of Science in the DPRK has recently succeeded in localizing the production of glucose test paper.
					 The researchers of the institute invented a method of producing enzyme indispensable for test paper and began its mass production, said Dr. and Assoc. Prof. Jong Hung Man, who is a section chief of the institute, when interviewed by KCNA.
					
					 The product was awarded the Certificate of the DPRK Invention.

articles.title: KPA Taking Lead in Building Thriving Nation (3)
articles.content:
KPA Taking Lead in Building Thriving Nation (3)
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The might of army-people unity has been fully displayed with the leading role of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in the era of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Under the slogan calling for helping the people, the KPA has played a key role in building a thriving nation over the past three years.
					
					 After receiving the order of Kim Jong Un to build a service complex at a machine factory before the birth centenary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15, 2012), KPA servicepersons devoted their all to carrying out his order.
					
					 Kim Jong Un highly praised the soldier builders for completing the complex in time on the highest level during his visit to the factory on May Day Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 When the Kaechon and Komdok areas were hit hard by flood in 2012, servicepersons together with the people eradicated the aftermath of flood damage in those areas in a short span of time, demonstrating the might of the revolutionary soldier spirit and army-people unity.
					
					 Thanks to the concerted efforts of the army and people, the October 8 Factory took its shape only in 10 months as a model one in the age of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 During a visit to a newly-built foodstuff factory in November this year, Kim Jong Un highly praised it as an edifice of patriotic devotion built by the dint of the army-people unity and called upon all the units to fan up the flame of modernization by underscoring the need to follow the work attitude of KPA servicepersons. 
					
					 The DPRK will surely win the final victory in building a powerful nation as long as there is the KPA which always remain loyal to the idea and leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Branded as "Yusin" Dictatorã€€
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Branded as "Yusin" Dictator 
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, who seized power on a fraudulent elections, has turned south Korea into a tundra of democracy as her father Park Chung-Hee, "yusin" dictator, did in the past.
					 It can be clearly evidenced by the south Korean "constitutional court's" recent decision on disbanding the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), a legitimate democratic political party. It is a product of the Park-led conservatives who are calling for "liberal democracy".
					
					 The south Korean press media describe the illegal disbandment of UPP as the ruin of democracy and restoration of dictatorship in south Korea.
					
					 In this regard, Jong Hyok, a researcher of the Law Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK, told KCNA that the disbandment is tantamount to a political terrorism which can be seen only in south Korea where dictatorial forces stalk with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 It reminds everyone of Hitler's "Reichstag fire case" in the 1930s.
					
					 It is a political coup d'etat aimed at stamping out the progressive forces desirous of independence, democracy and peaceful reunification.
					
					 Terming Park Geun Hye the director and superintendent of the coup, the south Korean press media noted that the "biggest feat" she performed during her two year-long stay in power is the "overall retreat from democracy" with the UPP disbandment as an occasion.
					
					 Park, figured herself a bandog, revenged herself upon the UPP for campaigning against her during the "presidential election", which arouses much criticism even from the Amnesty International and other international human rights bodies.
					
					 She is shameless enough to beautify the decision as a "historic one to safeguard liberal democracy in south Korea".
					
					 The decision on the UPP disbandment only lays bare the political backwardness of south Korean society before the international community.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is doomed to the fate of her father.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Disbandment of UPP Flailedã€€
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Disbandment of UPP Flailed
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement on Dec. 22 denouncing the south Korean puppet group's fascist tyrannical act of forcibly disbanding a progressive party.
					 The statement accused the south Korean "constitutional court" of deciding for no clear reason on the dissolution of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), carried away by prejudice, and Park Geun Hye of wholeheartedly "welcoming" it, terming the decision a "historical decision which firmly protected liberal democracy."
					
					 The UPP's case is giving strong shock to the overseas Koreans, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Park who seized power through power-backed fraudulent election disbanded even the political party which had been founded with the support of people.
					
					 "Great unity of people" touted by Park is no more than a unity of her group aimed to eliminate political parties opposed to her policy and to suppress the organizations and individuals desirous of national reconciliation and reunification after labeling them "followers of the north."
					
					 This brought to light the true colors of the dictatorial regime which inherited the "yusin" dictatorship as a legacy.
					
					 The statement appealed to the progressive political parties and social organizations of south Korea to positively turn out in the action for forcing the Park regime to step down and achieving democracy.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1 158th Wednesday rally in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul on December 24 demanding the Japanese government take a responsible measure for the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The organization denounced Japan for evading the blame for its past crimes and refusing to admit them till now though the public is becoming increasingly vocal demanding the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 It urged the Japanese government to admit the past crimes and make an official apology and legal reparation for them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by German Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by German Organization on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website from Dec. 15 to 17.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982), deals with the historic exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by founding the Juche idea and their significance, the origin of the Juche idea and its philosophical principles, socio-historic principles, guiding principles and historic significance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Personages
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- An internet seminar of the East European and Central Asian regions took place on Dec. 19 to commemorate the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Speeches were made under the titles of "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il," "Glorious revolutionary history of Comrade Kim Jong Il" and "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, guiding idea of mankind" by the chairman of the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, the chairman of the February 16 Society for the Study of Juche Idea and Songun Politics of Belarus, the chairman of the Kazakh Kim Jong Il Association for the Study and Dissemination of the Juche Idea and other personages of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea and Songun politics. 
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il, holding aloft the banner of Songun, reliably defended socialism and turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and a satellite manufacturer and launcher. 
					
					 They went on:
					
					 He was a peerless great man as he developed and enriched the Juche idea, established the Songun political mode and thus made special contributions to the human cause of independence. 
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a thriving socialist nation thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 A message to him was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Is Alive in Hearts of Progressives
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Is Alive in Hearts of Progressives
						
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A Russian political party and a Maltese organization carried special write-ups on their internet websites on Dec. 16 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation carried articles including the one titled "Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 An article titled "Third anniversary of demise of Chairman of National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" said the Korean people have remained loyal to him with noble moral obligation for the leader.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is standing in the van of the Korean people in their struggle to translate into a reality the idea and desire of Kim Jong Il, regarding his last instructions as guidelines, the article stressed.
					
					 The Group for the Study of Juche Philosophy and Songun Politics of Malta carried articles including the one titled "Leader Kim Jong Il will live forever."
					
					 They praised him as the greatest thinker and theoretician who developed in depth in an all-round way the Juche idea, Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, and the master of leadership who ushered in the great heyday of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 They stressed Kim Jong Il is alive in the hearts of the Koreans and other progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 15.
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The work formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification, and indicates the tasks for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on the basis of them and the ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno nuevos invernaderos de Granja 8 de Junio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno nuevos invernaderos de Granja 8 de Junio
						
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno los invernaderos de verduras, nuevamente construidos en la Granja 8 de Junio del EPC.
					Contemplando los invernaderos alineados, el Mariscal expuso gran satisfaccion diciendo que se construyeron bien estandarizados y le parece presenciar un dibujo.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de los invernaderos, el Mariscal estudio en detalles el estado de construccion y el cultivo de verduras.
					
					Senalo que es fantastico ver desde arriba y desde abajo los invernaderos levantados no en el terreno llano sino en la colina para elevar el coeficiente de aprovechamiento de la tierra.
					
					Son perfectos los invernaderos de la Granja 8 de Junio del EPC, recalco y asevero que es importante construir bien el invernadero, pero lo mas importante es que los uniformados se beneficien realmente de ello al llevar bien el cultivo de verduras.
					
					Para realizar bien el cultivo de verduras de invernadero, hay que prestar atencion a elevar la responsabilidad y el nivel tecnico-practico de los cultivadores, acoto. Y ordeno introducir activamente los avanzados metodos agricolas mediante la cooperacion con la rama de investigacion cientifica especializada en verduras para lograr en el nivel elevado la cientifizacion y la intensificacion del cultivo de verduras.
					
					Subrayando la necesidad de concentrar la fuerza en la divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas para avivar el fervor de la innovacion colectiva en la labor de intendencia del EPC, el Mariscal instruyo editar nuevamente una revista mensual para explicar la politica del partido sobre la labor de abastecimiento, presentar las tareas y los remedios para su realizacion y propagar ampliamente las avanzadas ciencias y tecnicas y las mejores experiencias.
					
					El Mariscal dio el agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC a las unidades participantes en la construccion de los invernaderos.
					
					A traves de los nuevos invernaderos en la citada granja puede saber bien como el EPC acepta y cumple la politica del partido, acentuo. Asevero que el EPC no sabe el regateo ni el pretexto ante la orden, la orientacion e instrucciones del partido y esta habituado en cumplir e informar inmediato y correctamente cualesquier cosas y agrego que esto es el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					Constituye el prototipo y ejemplar los invernaderos de verduras de la Granja 8 de Junio del EPC, destaco y exhorto a esforzarse activamente por suministrar ininterrumpidamente en todas las estaciones las verduras frescas al pueblo al generalizar en todo el pais el ejemplo del ejercito.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Pak Yong Sik, Han Kwang Sang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRPP advierte a maniacos conflictivos surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRPP advierte a maniacos conflictivos surcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica la vispera una declaracion en relacion con que hace poco Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles volvieron a inventar a fuerza la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC en la reciente sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU y orquestaron una farsa de adoptarla como agenda oficial del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					La nota condena que esto deviene un desafio total al digno regimen socialista de la RPDC y al pueblo coreano y una declaracion de guerra contra ella.
					
					Y revela y denuncia rotundamente la conducta criminal de la banda titere surcoreana que en la ONU se porto como perro maltes del imperio yanqui al frente del alboroto de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye cuestiona con los datos falsificados el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC para difamar la imagen de esta y derrocar a toda costa su regimen llevando a cuestas a su amo gringo, insiste y prosigue:
					
					Con tales alborotos persigue encubrir el horrible estado de DDHH del Sur de Corea, convertido en una ruina de derechos humanos debido a la gobernacion fascista y la infame politica antipopular, y salir de la severa crisis politica al desviar la opinion publica.
					
					Cuando esta a punto de bancarrota general su intento de aplastar la RPDC, el imperio, la banda titere y otras fuerzas hostiles se enfrascan en derrumbar el digno sistema y regimen de la RPDC al falsificar extremadamente el inexistente "problema de DDHH del Norte (de Corea)", lo cual es una vana ilusion nunca irrealizable.
					
					Responderemos con el resuelto contraataque a la declaracion imprudente de "guerra de DDHH" anti-RPDC de los belicistas surcoreanos.
					
					Nuestro despiadado castigo de justicia golpeara primero a los  titeres surcoreanos, lacayos de su amo gringo enloquecidos en la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					La banda titere experimentara cuan caro sera el precio de su alboroto de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Extraditado surcoreano que entro ilegalmente en RPDC
articles.content:
Extraditado surcoreano que entro ilegalmente en RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea extradito el dia 26 por via de Phanmunjom a la entidad homologa surcoreana a un habitante surcoreano quien habia entrado ilegalmente en la RPDC.

articles.title: Efectuado concurso nacional de musicas folcloricas
articles.content:
Efectuado concurso nacional de musicas folcloricas 
						
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el concurso nacional de musicas folcloricas acaparando la atencion de especialistas y aficionados.
					Segun un funcionario del Ministerio de Cultura, el objetivo del concurso estuvo en fomentar las canciones e instrumentos musicales folcloricos en la rama de arte masivo y llenar a todo el pais de la idiosincrasia.
					
					En el concurso, dividido en el sector de grupos de propaganda artistica y de agitacion artistica movil y el de grupos artisticos, tomaron parte mas de 40 entidades seleccionadas en los comites, ministerios, organos centrales y todas las provincias del pais.
					
					Los participantes demostraron la superioridad y la vitalidad de la musica folclorica al interpretar excelentemente las canciones folcloricas de varios temas en diferentes generos tales como el solo, el coro, el solo de instrumento musical folclorico, el concierto de instrumentos, el concierto y otras formas.
					
					Ocuparon primeros lugares en los respectivos sectores el grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil y los grupos artisticos del Complejo de Fertilizantes de Hungnam y el Almacen No. 1 de Pyongyang.
